serverType.description: This server is a Light Roleplay (LRP) environment.

conduct.mainRule: All players must behave respectfully toward each other at all times.
conduct.noDiscrimination:
Discrimination against real or real-life-related persons is strictly prohibited.
Racism Sexism Hate speech Insults Mobbing Unnecessary trolling

roleplay.inCharacter: Stay in character at all times during roleplay.
roleplay.outOfCharacter: If you need to communicate out of character, use OOC.

violence.rule: Killing or similar hostile actions are only allowed if you have an appropriate antagonist role.

support.questions: For questions about the server or applications, please visit our Discord server.
